Getting Started

Install and launch R packages

this code chunk below uses p_load() of pacman to check if
tidyverse package have been installed. If they are they will
be launched

```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse)

```

importing the data

```{r}
exam_data <- read.csv("data_handson/Exam_data.csv")


```
